title: How to view/have the exact same opened tabs on different devices?
content:
How to view/have the exact same opened tabs on different devices?

I am aware that I can access tabs from other devices by going to my firefox account>syncTabs, then open from there.

But What I want is have the exact same opened tabs between different devices.

Thanks
creator: vernonlee

title: Can't open links in a new tab
content: I am using Windows 11 on a new HP laptop. I had the same issue on my old HP laptop with Windows 10. Sometimes, I cannot ctrl-click on a link and open it in a new tab. It always opens in the same tab. I know there are html links and javascript links. Is it possible that the person designing the page makes it not possible to open in a new tab?
creator: somelton

title: no puedo cambiar la configuracion de busquedas no me valida los captchas
content: no puedo cambiar la configuracion del navegador para cambiar el idioma de la busqueda, el pais o la cantidad de busquedas por paginas, porque me sale un captcha infinito que no se resuelve.
creator: migdalia.ortega

title: How can I copy files in the firefox "M Gmail" browser to my thunderbird Mail browser?
content:
I am recovering my thunderbird browser after reinstalling it. Before the reinstall, thunderbird was full of the apps currently in my firefox "M Gmail", but the reinstall left thunderbird empty.

I have entered the folder names from "M Gmail" into thunderbird, but I can't seem to copy the "M Gmail" folder contents to thunderbird.

During my ~3 week absence from gmail, several users have emailed me suggestions as to how to get back on the internet; I will answer them in time, but I'd rather send them thunderbird emails.

How can I copy files from "M Gmail" to thunderbird?

I am at jwill1000000@gmail.com .
creator: jwill1000000
